ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank all the study participants for their contribution of study samples. We are also grateful to field, laboratory and data management staff of the KEMRI Wellcome Trust Research Programme for collection and storage of the samples and data retrieval. We sincerely thank Dr. Patricia Cane for her kind donation of RSVA2 virus and Hep2 cells. We highly appreciate the statistical advice provided by Dr. Eric Ohuma of University of Oxford, UK. This paper is published with the permission of the Director of KEMRI.
